entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is trying to help Hermione with her spell.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who is having trouble with the Expecto Patronum spell.

entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is a bystander who is watching Harry and Hermione's interaction.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to help Hermione with her spell, as indicated by his words 'do yours, Hermione'.
Harry is speaking to Mrs. Cattermole about Hermione's struggles with the spell.
